snp5.0:976: Kosalānaṁ purā rammā,agamā dakkhiṇāpathaṁ;Ākiñcaññaṁ patthayāno,brāhmaṇo mantapāragū.
snp5.0:977: So assakassa visaye,aḷakassa samāsane;Vasi godhāvarīkūle,uñchena ca phalena ca.
snp5.0:978: Tasseva upanissāya,gāmo ca vipulo ahu;Tato jātena āyena,mahāyaññamakappayi.
snp5.0:979: Mahāyaññaṁ yajitvāna,puna pāvisi assamaṁ;Tasmiṁ paṭipaviṭṭhamhi,añño āgañchi brāhmaṇo.
snp5.0:980: Ugghaṭṭapādo tasito,paṅkadanto rajassiro;So ca naṁ upasaṅkamma,satāni pañca yācati.
snp5.0:981: Tamenaṁ bāvarī disvā,āsanena nimantayi;Sukhañca kusalaṁ pucchi,idaṁ vacanamabravi.
snp5.0:982: "Yaṁ kho mama deyyadhammaṁ,Sabbaṁ visajjitaṁ mayā;Anujānāhi me brahme,Natthi pañcasatāni me".
snp5.0:983: "Sace me yācamānassa,bhavaṁ nānupadassati;Sattame divase tuyhaṁ,muddhā phalatu sattadhā".
snp5.0:984: Abhisaṅkharitvā kuhako,bheravaṁ so akittayi;Tassa taṁ vacanaṁ sutvā,bāvarī dukkhito ahu.
snp5.0:985: Ussussati anāhāro,Sokasallasamappito;Athopi evaṁ cittassa,Jhāne na ramatī mano.
snp5.0:986: Utrastaṁ dukkhitaṁ disvā,Devatā atthakāminī;Bāvariṁ upasaṅkamma,Idaṁ vacanamabravi.
snp5.0:987: "Na so muddhaṁ pajānāti,Kuhako so dhanatthiko;Muddhani muddhapāte vā,Ñāṇaṁ tassa na vijjati".
snp5.0:988: "Bhotī carahi jānāsi,Taṁ me akkhāhi pucchitā;Muddhaṁ muddhādhipātañca,Taṁ suṇoma vaco tava".
snp5.0:989: "Ahampetaṁ na jānāmi,Ñāṇamettha na vijjati;Muddhani muddhādhipāte ca,Jinānaṁ hettha dassanaṁ".
snp5.0:990: "Atha ko carahi jānāti,Asmiṁ pathavimaṇḍale;Muddhaṁ muddhādhipātañca,Taṁ me akkhāhi devate".
snp5.0:992: So hi brāhmaṇa sambuddho,Sabbadhammāna pāragū;Sabbābhiññābalappatto,Sabbadhammesu cakkhumā;Sabbakammakkhayaṁ patto,Vimutto upadhikkhaye.
snp5.0:993: Buddho so bhagavā loke,Dhammaṁ deseti cakkhumā;Taṁ tvaṁ gantvāna pucchassu,So te taṁ byākarissati".
snp5.0:994: Sambuddhoti vaco sutvā,Udaggo bāvarī ahu;Sokassa tanuko āsi,Pītiñca vipulaṁ labhi.
snp5.0:995: So bāvarī attamano udaggo,Taṁ devataṁ pucchati vedajāto;"Katamamhi gāme nigamamhi vā pana,Katamamhi vā janapade lokanātho;Yattha gantvāna passemu,Sambuddhaṁ dvipaduttamaṁ".
snp5.0:996: "Sāvatthiyaṁ kosalamandire jino,Pahūtapañño varabhūrimedhaso;So sakyaputto vidhuro anāsavo,Muddhādhipātassa vidū narāsabho".
snp5.0:997: Tato āmantayī sisse,Brāhmaṇe mantapārage;Etha māṇavā akkhissaṁ,Suṇātha vacanaṁ mama.Yasseso dullabho loke,Pātubhāvo abhiṇhaso;
snp5.0:998: Svājja lokamhi uppanno,Sambuddho iti vissuto;Khippaṁ gantvāna sāvatthiṁ,Passavho dvipaduttamaṁ".
snp5.0:999: "Kathaṁ carahi jānemu,Disvā buddhoti brāhmaṇa;Ajānataṁ no pabrūhi,Yathā jānemu taṁ mayaṁ".
snp5.0:1001: Yassete honti gattesu,Mahāpurisalakkhaṇā;Dveyeva tassa gatiyo,Tatiyā hi na vijjati.
snp5.0:1002: Sace agāraṁ āvasati,Vijeyya pathaviṁ imaṁ;Adaṇḍena asatthena,Dhammena manusāsati.
snp5.0:1003: Sace ca so pabbajati,Agārā anagāriyaṁ;Vivaṭṭacchado sambuddho,Arahā bhavati anuttaro.
snp5.0:1004: Jātiṁ gottañca lakkhaṇaṁ,Mante sisse punāpare;Muddhaṁ muddhādhipātañca,Manasāyeva pucchatha.
snp5.0:1005: Anāvaraṇadassāvī,Yadi buddho bhavissati;Manasā pucchite pañhe,Vācāya vissajessati".
snp5.0:1006: Bāvarissa vaco sutvā,Sissā soḷasa brāhmaṇā;Ajito tissametteyyo,Puṇṇako atha mettagū.
snp5.0:1007: Dhotako upasīvo ca,Nando ca atha hemako;Todeyya-kappā dubhayo,Jatukaṇṇī ca paṇḍito.
snp5.0:1008: Bhadrāvudho udayo ca,Posālo cāpi brāhmaṇo;Mogharājā ca medhāvī,Piṅgiyo ca mahāisi.
snp5.0:1010: Bāvariṁ abhivādetvā,Katvā ca naṁ padakkhiṇaṁ;Jaṭājinadharā sabbe,Pakkāmuṁ uttarāmukhā.
snp5.0:1013: Pāvañca bhoganagaraṁ,Vesāliṁ māgadhaṁ puraṁ;Pāsāṇakaṁ cetiyañca,Ramaṇīyaṁ manoramaṁ.
snp5.0:1015: Bhagavā tamhi samaye,Bhikkhusaṅghapurakkhato;Bhikkhūnaṁ dhammaṁ deseti,Sīhova nadatī vane.
snp5.0:1016: Ajito addasa buddhaṁ,Sataraṁsiṁva bhāṇumaṁ;Candaṁ yathā pannarase,Pāripūriṁ upāgataṁ.
snp5.0:1017: Athassa gatte disvāna,Paripūrañca byañjanaṁ;Ekamantaṁ ṭhito haṭṭho,Manopañhe apucchatha.
snp5.0:1018: "Ādissa jammanaṁ brūhi,Gottaṁ brūhi salakkhaṇaṁ;Mantesu pāramiṁ brūhi,Kati vāceti brāhmaṇo".
snp5.0:1019: "Vīsaṁ vassasataṁ āyu,So ca gottena bāvarī;Tīṇissa lakkhaṇā gatte,Tiṇṇaṁ vedāna pāragū.
snp5.0:1020: Lakkhaṇe itihāse ca,Sanighaṇḍusakeṭubhe;Pañcasatāni vāceti,Sadhamme pāramiṁ gato".
snp5.0:1021: "Lakkhaṇānaṁ pavicayaṁ,Bāvarissa naruttama;Kaṅkhacchida pakāsehi,Mā no kaṅkhāyitaṁ ahu".
snp5.0:1022: "Mukhaṁ jivhāya chādeti,Uṇṇassa bhamukantare;Kosohitaṁ vatthaguyhaṁ,Evaṁ jānāhi māṇava".
snp5.0:1023: Pucchañhi kiñci asuṇanto,Sutvā pañhe viyākate;Vicinteti jano sabbo,Vedajāto katañjalī.
snp5.0:1024: "Ko nu devo vā brahmā vā,Indo vāpi sujampati;Manasā pucchite pañhe,Kametaṁ paṭibhāsati".
snp5.0:1025: "Muddhaṁ muddhādhipātañca,Bāvarī paripucchati;Taṁ byākarohi bhagavā,Kaṅkhaṁ vinaya no ise".
snp5.0:1027: Tato vedena mahatā,Santhambhitvāna māṇavo;Ekaṁsaṁ ajinaṁ katvā,Pādesu sirasā pati.
snp5.0:1028: "Bāvarī brāhmaṇo bhoto,Saha sissehi mārisa;Udaggacitto sumano,Pāde vandati cakkhuma".
snp5.0:1029: "Sukhito bāvarī hotu,Saha sissehi brāhmaṇo;Tvañcāpi sukhito hohi,Ciraṁ jīvāhi māṇava.
snp5.0:1030: Bāvarissa ca tuyhaṁ vā,Sabbesaṁ sabbasaṁsayaṁ;Katāvakāsā pucchavho,Yaṁ kiñci manasicchatha".
snp5.0:1031: Sambuddhena katokāso,Nisīditvāna pañjalī;Ajito paṭhamaṁ pañhaṁ,Tattha pucchi tathāgataṁ.
